## Table

```html
<table class="primary">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th>City</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>Francisco</td>
      <td>Valencia, Spain</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>Eve</td>
      <td>San Francisco, USA</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>Martin</td>
      <td>New York, USA</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>Sarah</td>
      <td>London, UK</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
```
